perturbation.original_text: Vertex shall be responsible for the sourcing/producing of the Product and shall sell to Bunker One, and Bunker One shall purchase, the agreed Output of the Product in accordance to FOB (Marrero, LA, US (or per new/additional agreed Area)) the Incoterms® 2010 rules, at the following scheduled pricing: the arithmetic mean of Platts #2 USGC Pipe and Platt's ULSD USGC Waterborne on agreed pricing days less the agreed upon discount [****].
perturbation.changed_text: Vertex will endeavor to be responsible for sourcing/producing the Product and will sell to Bunker One, and Bunker One will attempt to purchase, the agreed Output of the Product in general accordance with FOB (Marrero, LA, US (or per new/additional agreed Area)) the Incoterms® 2010 rules, at the following scheduled pricing: the arithmetic mean of Platts #2 USGC Pipe and Platt's ULSD USGC Waterborne on agreed pricing days less a potentially agreed upon discount [****].
perturbation.explanation: The modification replaces 'shall be' with 'will endeavor to be' and 'shall purchase' with 'will attempt to purchase,' weakening the obligation. Changing 'agreed upon discount' to 'potentially agreed upon discount' adds further ambiguity. This affects the enforceability of the sourcing and purchasing commitments. Also, it removes the clarity required under contract law, turning mandatory actions into discretionary ones.
perturbation.contradicted_law: General Contract Law - Creates uncertainty in essential terms, making specific performance difficult to enforce. Under the Uniform Commercial Code (UCC), contracts for the sale of goods require definiteness of key terms.

perturbation.original_text: Bunker One shall establish and maintain at its office in Mobile, Alabama a detailed ledger (the "detailed ledger") within their current reporting system with re- spect to this Agreement and all transactions hereunder sufficient to track and reconcile all such transactions and to calculate and track Hedge Position Value, Hedging Profit, Hedging Loss, Inventory Cost, Inventory Market Value, Remaining Exposure, Total Exposure, Total Realized P/L, Inter- est, Unrealized Gain on Hedging, Unrealized Loss on Hedging, Unrealized Gain on Inventory and Unrealized Loss on Inventory and any and all payments made by or to Bunker One or Vertex with respect to this Agreement.
perturbation.changed_text: Bunker One will attempt to establish and maintain at its office in Mobile, Alabama a ledger (the "detailed ledger") within their reporting system with respect to this Agreement and transactions sufficient to generally track and reconcile transactions and to estimate Hedge Position Value, Hedging Profit, Hedging Loss, Inventory Cost, Inventory Market Value, Remaining Exposure, Total Exposure, Total Realized P/L, Interest, Unrealized Gain on Hedging, Unrealized Loss on Hedging, Unrealized Gain on Inventory and Unrealized Loss on Inventory and payments made by or to Bunker One or Vertex with respect to this Agreement.
perturbation.explanation: The phrase 'shall establish and maintain' is replaced with 'will attempt to establish and maintain,' and 'detailed ledger' becomes simply 'ledger.' Furthermore, 'sufficient to track and reconcile all such transactions' is watered down to 'sufficient to generally track and reconcile transactions.' Also, 'calculate and track' is replaced with 'estimate,' introducing ambiguity around the accuracy and reliability of financial reporting. This impacts transparency and auditability.
perturbation.contradicted_law: Sarbanes-Oxley Act (SOX) - SOX requires accurate and reliable financial reporting. The modifications introduce ambiguity and weaken the obligation to maintain detailed and accurate records.

perturbation.original_text: Payment by Bunker One for the Product, as defined in clause 2.1, will be made by wire transfer within three (3) Business Days after the date Vertex invoices Bunker One, to an account desig- nated from time to time by Vertex.
perturbation.changed_text: Payment by Bunker One for the Product, as defined in clause 2.1, may be made by wire transfer within a reasonable time after Vertex provides what it considers an invoice to Bunker One, to a potentially designated account.
perturbation.explanation: The phrase 'will be made' is changed to 'may be made,' and 'three (3) Business Days' becomes 'a reasonable time,' making the payment timeline vague. 'After the date Vertex invoices Bunker One' is changed to 'after Vertex provides what it considers an invoice to Bunker One', giving Vertex broad discretion. 'To an account designated from time to time by Vertex' is changed to 'to a potentially designated account', further weakening the obligation. This creates uncertainty about when and how payments will be made.
perturbation.contradicted_law: General Contract Law & UCC - Definite payment terms are essential for contract enforceability. The changes create ambiguity around payment timing and method.
